job_description: This position is limited to students that are registered in a recognized Co-Op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or University. Join the team that's transforming the way the world communicates!! With operations in 130 countries, Alcatel-Lucent is the first truly global communications solutions provider, offering the most complete end-to-end portfolio of solutions and services in the industry. Our passionate and experienced team converts challenges into opportunities in the areas of third-generation mobile networking, metro optical and packet, circuit-to-packet, broadband access, advanced network and professional services, and next-generation operations support systems. We are looking for a co-op student to join our team in developing new services, applications and processes for the Product Support Portal and the Deployment Quoting Tool. The Product Support Portal has a user community of thousands of employees and customers worldwide. The Deployment Quoting Tool is used by all Business Units to generate Customer ready quotes for deployment services across all technologies. The ideal candidate will be a resourceful, independent and flexible individual who can work in a dynamic Agile driven team environment. Responsibilities:Participate defining new functionality derived from user community feedback and requestsAs part of the development team deliver new functionality and enhancements for the Knowledge BaseProvide support for the Knowledge Base web and tool applications â€“ assist in responding to customer and employee queries
job_requirements: QUALIFICATIONS:2nd year+ co-op student registered in a recognized Co-Op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or University; Engineering or Computer Science ESSENTIAL:  The ideal candidate has some or all of the following qualities:Knowledge of HTML, CSS, XML, XSLTKnowledge of JavaScript and AJAX, particularly of the DOJO and JQuery frameworksJava (Spring framework), J2EE and web application development Understanding of principles of graphic and interaction design, experience with image manipulationFamiliarity with test-driven and agile development approachesQuick learner and passion for working in a team environment  Alcatel-Lucent Canada is committed to building a skilled, diverse workforce reflective of Canadian society. As a result, we promote employment equity and encourage women, Aboriginal persons, persons with a disability or members of a visible minority group to apply.Open To All Majors:No
